mapper.select: SELECT lecture_code AS lec_code , ac_code AS ac_code , member_id AS m_id , room_code AS room_code , member_id2 AS mem_id , subject_code AS sub_code , class_level_code AS clle_code , lecture_stu_num AS lec_stu_num , lecture_start AS lec_start , lecture_end AS lec_end , lecture_date AS lec_date FROM lecture
